content: Recently, Mountain Rose Herbs held a contest for folks to create fun videos that promote health, happiness and environmental preservation. The winner, Chives the Mouse, created by Catherine Wing and Bill Buckendorf, features a hip mouse named Chives who knows a thing or two about herbs and green living. Some of the best parts of the video are when Chives recommends Elderberry Syrup to a furry friend recovering from the flu, when she raps that "lemon balm makes me calm" and when she does a little dance at the end that looks like she's pretending to spin a turn table.  Holla!
title: Rapping Mouse Works the Mic to Promote Herbs and Green Living
author: chelseav
